creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: gnarled old tree with bare branches, floating over a pinkish-tan, blue and grey mottled ground; some exposed roots interspersed with text
dimension:
52 13/16 x 25 3/4 in. (134.14 x 65.41 cm) (image)
76 3/4 x 29 3/4 in. (194.95 x 75.57 cm) (overall, without roller)
text: The artist Zeng Xiaojun is deeply fascinated old trees, some of which have been struck by lightning yet continue to grow. In this painting, Zeng depicts a gnarled old tree with bare branches in a crisp, dry style. Interspersed with the roots is an inscription, the artist's signature, and a poem composed by an anonymous author during the Eastern Han Dynasty (25 - 220 BCE). The human transience mentioned in the poem contrasts sharply with the sturdy and enduring nature of the old tree.
title: Passing of Time
